@DemolitionsLdn @RyeHillParkEst @PeckhamVision @lb_southwark @thameswater @Southwark_News @SthLondonPress @EnvAgency What is a ‚Äòclimate emergency‚Äô? 
What does it represent? 

A cynical person would say that it seems like marketing.

I‚Äôve attended many consultations, it‚Äôs become clear that those broadly in governance don‚Äôt have the expertise in environmental standards and protections.

Are you aware that rivers are also being polluted with raw sewage on a regular basis?
